verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa-miśra-nāma āra ācārya-tanaya
caitanya-gosāñi baise yāṅhāra hṛdaya

synonyms: kṛṣṇa-miśra—of the name Kṛṣṇa Miśra; nāma—name; āra—and; ācārya-tanaya—the son of Advaita Ācārya; caitanya-gosāñi—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; baise—sits; yāṅhāra—in whose; hṛdaya—heart.
translation: Kṛṣṇa Miśra was a son of Advaita Ācārya. Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu always sat in his heart.
